subject: Re: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour

full_text:
Al,

- The results as written, were very good.  Actual conversations were 
documented, and even help provided on ways to better contact and 
interface with the spirits, given by the spirits themselves.

- I don't know about specs on the Ion Lamp. I just wanted to try it 
since it is active light frequency that changes or is manipulated 
very easily.

- I'll keep your ideas in mind when I do my next set.

- Thanks for the advice about finding mediums.  I know a few and will 
probably talk with them since I am already friends with each of them.

Mike

Mike, Is there any research that says that an ion lamp is hyper 
sensitive? 

You might wish to hookup your EMF detectors in such a fashion that 
each one showing a response would be video taped. If one has a 
positive, then it might show up on your video.

Also, if you are interested in locating a medium, look in your local 
phone book for a local spiritualist church. They will have many 
mediums attending. Before you ask to test them, please, build up a 
friendship first. I was recently asked to be tested by some locals 
but their proposal was very poorly written and had no real tests or 
conclusions, per se. I turned them down. 

Al
